website_summaries.verdict: A dewy face spray that smells great and leaves skin feeling refreshed. Bottle has a fine mist. No glitter particles.
pros: Features hyaluronic acid to hydrate skin and hibiscus flower alpha hydroxy acid to improve skin's texture
Has a pleasant watermelon scent and applies in a very fine, even mist
Can be used before makeup as a primer or after as a dewy setting spray
cons: Not everyone is a fan of the fragrance

customer_reviews.title: Great smelling fine, refreshing mist!
customer_reviews.text: Saw a youtube review on this product and wanted to try. It was a bit expensive and I felt for the size once I got it, it was really expensive. It is recommended to shake it first and then spray as it separates. I love how it sprays. It's an even, fine mist. It smells sooooo good, just like watermelon. Do I feel hydrated after using it? For a bit but I dont think it lasts. I also wonder if I should put it in the fridge and use it as a cold mist. That could feel great on the face. Will continue using and update if things get better.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Bottle smaller than I thought
customer_reviews.text: I like how my skin feels when I apply it. It has a light watermelon scent although I wanted it to be stronger lol. Also thought it was going to be a bigger bottle for the price I paid but the ingredients that are in this bottle made it worth the pay. Other sprays don’t have apple cider vinegar which is super good for skin so I guess it balances out the price I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Esmeralda

customer_reviews.title: weird product
customer_reviews.text: this must have been a defective product. the one I got was a weird color and the scent was gross. also, it balled up on my face when I applied it. had to wash it off my face. all the other reviews have been great so I think I just got a weird bottle or a fake. who knows
customer_reviews.author: raissa

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great!
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin and I have no issues with the product. I am brown skin and got really tanned this summer. The glow O have is awesome
customer_reviews.author: Coach El

customer_reviews.title: Expensive for size and performance.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t smell like a watermelon jolly rancher to me I was disappointed. It does moisturize. The mist is fine. But otherwise , it did not wow me . Don’t believe the hype. Will not purchase again for $30 or more! Tiny container. I agree with another consumer smells like watermelon and paint / chemical fumes.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Best mist ever!
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell! I keep it in the refrigerator during the summer and then use it after I apply makeup. So refreshing! Good value for the money. lasts a long time. Gave one to each daughter for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Fine mist and refreshing scent
customer_reviews.text: Love the fine mist it gives and the refreshing watermelon scent. I work night shifts which really causes my skin to dry and this one helps give moisture without ruining my makeup. A bit pricey though. Wish I can refill it.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: like it, small packaging for price
customer_reviews.text: I had an Amazon gift card, I’ve seen this product around many places and believe me when I tell you I would never spend my own money on this. I love the smell, packaging, fine mist, and will probably see brightening of the skin after a few days/weeks of usage. This was smaller than I expected but enjoy for the experience. I do love this product, but I think it is overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: amazon user

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a 5/5!
customer_reviews.text: It was really refreshing to use and I absolutely loved the smell! It was an okay moisturizer but I’m overall just pleased with how light it made my face and not like it was too oily.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: You wont regret this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!! I spray this on my t-zone after applying my makeup and I get a natural radiant glow that leaves my skin soft and smooth, and the scent! Delicious! I will purchase this until the day I die, and hopefully will be wearing it then too! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany LaFlash

customer_reviews.title: BEATS ROSEWATER 10000%

I saw another review here about the same problem but ordered anyway. FYI.

The bottle is smaller than I thought for the price, but it does what it says it does. Light and great smelling. Gonna try it out until it runs out, and make my decision then. So far, so good.

product_meta.title: Glow Recipe Watermelon Glow Ultra-Fine Mist - Hydrating Micro-Mist Spray for Face with Hyaluronic Acid, AHA + Amino Acid-Rich Watermelon Extract - Cruelty-Free + Vegan Skincare (75ml / 2.5 fl oz)
product_meta.description: Immerse skin with a delicate, watermelon fog with the Watermelon Ultra-Fine Mist. This juicy, unique bi-phase blend contains 84% watermelon, hyaluronic acid, and hibiscus flower AHA to refresh skin and enhance makeup.
feature_bullets: Hydrating Makeup Enhancer - A delicate, ultra-fine, hydrating fog mist designed for ultimate skin radiance and makeup enhancement leaves skin hydrated and refreshed.

Skin Quenching Hydration - Amino and vitamin-rich watermelon intensely hydrates, soothes, and fights free radical damage, hyaluronic acid instantly quenches thirsty skin, and natural hibiscus flower AHA to smooth uneven texture, soften, and hydrate.

All-Day Radiance - Inspired by the latest fog mist trend in Korea, this ultra-fine, hydrating mist is formulated to refresh and enhance makeup with a whisper-soft haze. A juicy blend of 84% watermelon, hyaluronic acid, and hibiscus refreshes and softens skin and enhances makeup for the ultimate skin radiance, 24/7.

How to Use - Before you spray, make sure to shake the bottle. From 8-10 inches away, firmly press nozzle and mist 2-3 times across face. Hold closer to face for maximum dewy effect. Use throughout the day. If you have oily/combination skin, spray it once every few hours to refresh skin. If your skin is on the drier side, hold it closer to your face and apply two spritzes every two hours to maintain hydration.
Free of - Parabens, Mineral Oil, Sulfates, Phthalates, Drying Alcohols, Synthetic Dyes. Vegan. Cruelty-free.
